items.content_html: A lightweight and straightforward HTTP server implemented in Node.js using the net and fs modules. This server handles basic GET and POST requests, supporting various endpoints such as echoing content, retrieving User-Agent details, and serving static files.
items.title: edlandoe/codecrafters-http-server-javascript: A lightweight and straightforward HTTP server implemented in Node.js using the net and fs modules. This server handles basic GET and POST requests, supporting various endpoints such as echoing content, retrieving User-Agent details, and serving static files.
